tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ownership_history (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  property_id UUID NOT NULL,
  owner_id UUID NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE NOT NULL,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE ownership_history ( 
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
    property_id UUID REFERENCES property_assessments(id), 
    owner_name VARCHAR(255), 
    ownership_start_date DATE, 
    ownership_end_date DATE 
);

CREATE TABLE tax_records(
    tax_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    property_id INT,
    tax_year INT,
    tax_amount DECIMAL,
    tax_paid BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE ownership_history(
    ownership_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    property_id INT,
    owner_name VARCHAR(100),
    ownership_start_date DATE,
    ownership_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE market_research(
    research_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    property_id INT,
    research_topic VARCHAR(100),
    research_date DATE,
    researcher_name VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE tax_records (
  tax_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  property_id INT,
  tax_year INT,
  tax_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
  FOREIGN KEY (property_id) REFERENCES property_assessments(property_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ownership_history (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  property_id INT,
  owner_name VARCHAR(255),
  transaction_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (property_id) REFERENCES property_assessments(property_id)
);

CREATE TABLE market_research_data (
  research_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  property_id INT,
  research_topic VARCHAR(255),
  researcher_name VARCHAR(255),
  research_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (property_id) REFERENCES property_assessments(property_id)
);

CREATE TABLE property_images (
  image_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  property_id INT,
  image_url VARCHAR(255),
  caption TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (property_id) REFERENCES property_assessments(property_id)
);
